name: Haven (itch) (Base Jump)
description:
Once the world has fallen, there is nothing more valuable than the lives of each and every person. In Project Haven, you must do everything you can to preserve human life against an onslaught of mutants hellbent on harvesting people for their own survival. It is up to you as leader of this Haven, to plan your defense.

-A unique tower-defense experience where the pathways are designed by the player using our unique barricade system.

-It is not enough to simply defend against the onslaught, the player must also save those that are being taken.

If the people of Haven can survive, they have a chance of creating a life for themselves. Otherwise, they will all be consumed.
